EmailTemplate.name: Operations Manager 3.3 Release mailer.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing VMTurbo Operations Manager 3.3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
If you ever think, "there must be a better way to control my virtual data center," you're right … there is.
Today, we released VMTurbo Operations Manager 3.3, our solution to help you transform your IT operations with software-defined control <http://bit.ly/WZsurD>. Our new version <http://bit.ly/WZsHej> provides simplified, unified control across heterogeneous cloud platforms that ensures workload performance and infrastructure utilization are maintained in the desired state. It has several new enhancements that founders Shmuel Kliger and Yuri Rabover will review in our webinar <http://bit.ly/YaHSRl> on Thursday, February 14.
If you're already using VMTurbo Operations Manager in your environment, you can get an update to version 3.3 by performing an online update (in the Admin tab). If you're interested in evaluating VMTurbo Operations Manager 3.3, we invite you to download a 30-day trial <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM> and see first-hand how it delivers operational savings, productivity gains, and improved utilization rates.
We hope you will take some time to learn more about VMTurbo Operations Manager 3.3 and explore our new features: - Visit our blog <http://bit.ly/WZsurD> - Read our press release <http://bit.ly/WZsHej> - Attend our webinar <http://bit.ly/YaHSRl> - Try our solution <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM>
Best regards, Lauren Whitehouse Director, Product Marketing
